name: The Creep
description:
The creep is an indie horror game that is currently in development.

This version is a test version, mainly to test performance, and get some feedback on the visual aspect of the game.

It is possible to die in this test version, but if you do end up dying, you will have to restart the game (refresh the page) in order to play again.

If you try it out, don't hessitate to leave some feedback,on "The Creep's" facebook page Here.
